thread.title: Discover Ireland Facebook Fans: 100,000 Thank Yous
thread.title_full: Travel | Discover Ireland Facebook Fans: 100,000 Thank Yous - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: Discover Ireland Facebook Fans: 100,000 Thank Yous
text:
Over the past four years the Discover Ireland Facebook page has grown into a community of 100,000 people, a group of like-minded individuals that share one passion - Ireland. Across the demographics - from young families with kids, to carefree singles to older couples on romantic breaks and everything else between - The Discover Ireland Facebook fans have shared their best holiday moments and most treasured memories, and this short video relives those snapshots of holidaying in Ireland at its brilliant best.
In this short clip from Irish content creators RMG we take a closer look at just some of the experiences and memories shared by this vibrant and connected community to date and look ahead to the future, reflecting that thereâ€™s still a lot to be discovered within Ireland.
Watch as Discover Ireland pay homage to their 100,000 strong community, thanking each Facebook fan for continuing to share their Irish holidaying memories.
For more inspiration on planning your next Irish break find Discover Ireland on Facebook now #thisisLIVING
Discover Ireland.ie . Supported by Failte Ireland.
